text: “(A chiphamaso) omwe akukuyembekezerani (kuti mavuto akugwereni), ngati mutapeza kupambana kochokera kwa Allah, amakuuzani: “Kodi sitidali nanu limodzi?” Koma ngati osakhulupirira atapeza gawo (lopambana), amanena (kwa osakhulupirira): “Kodi Sitidayandikire kukugonjetsani pamene tidali m’gulu lankhondo la okhulupirira koma timakutsekerezani kwa okhulupirira?” Koma Allah adzaweruza pakati panu tsiku la chiweruziro. Ndipo Allah sangawaikire njira osakhulupirira pa okhulupirira (kuti awagonjetse kotheratu)
